attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Human Fertilisation and Embryology Bill proposes to legalise new abuses of human embryos, to extend the scope of IVF from "infertility treatment" to "reproduction technology". It would also permit gametes to be taken from the patient without consent, and would extend the level of research permitted on human embryos including the creation of human-animal hybrids. Also, embryos with disabling conditions would be discriminated against, and it would be unlawful to discriminate in favour of a disabled human embryo should the Bill be passed.
